headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. to host 2025 annual meeting of shareholders
summary: FINDLAY, Ohio, Jan. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Marathon Petroleum Corp. announced today that its annual meeting of shareholders will take place April 30, 2025, at 10 a.m. ET in a virtual-only format...

headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: FINDLAY, Ohio, Jan. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The board of directors of Marathon Petroleum Corp. has declared a dividend of $0.91 per share on common stock. The dividend is payable March 10, 2025, to...
